reviews.review_msg: Professor was great. The videos and textbooks were very helpful and gave everything you needed. Although the class is very exam heavy being only graded on 2 midterms and 1 final. Professor Yang was very lenient towards those who had missed the due date and would open the exam for them again.
Really sweet and approachable, makes class fun. He should be a little more stern though. Make sure you don't count on the lectures in Osteo though - read the book!
